feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Trigger Docker release on publish by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19121
  • feat: enable booker atom for non org team events by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19125
  • fix: check searchParams existence by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19128
  • feat: v2 bookings return cancelledBy and rescheduledBy by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19110
  • fix: RSC boundary errors by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19130
  • chore: Salesforce add more logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19106
  • fix: change error message for cloudflare turnstile by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19135
  • feat: track who updated routing form by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19079
  • fix: logo for org team event types by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19131
  • chore: migrate api for team creation to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19105
  • chore: migrate api/availability/calendar to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19099
  • perf: make metadata generation light for event type single page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19143
  • chore: migrate api/cancel to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19074
  • chore: tech debt clearing — remove HeadSeo from components where not needed by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19151
  • fix: typos in docs/ by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19144
  • docs: Embed docs Help updated with metadata passing details by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19124
  • chore: refactor apiRouteMiddleware and add it to some api routes in App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19146
  • test: Scenario that replicates the crash in production by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19071
  • feat: add option to disable sending transcription emails by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19065
  • fix: source typo in EditUserForm.tsx by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19157
  • fix: source typo in bookingScenario.ts test by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19162

New Contributors

  • @luzpaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19144

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.7...v4.9.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: null check for useSearchParams() by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19175
  • fix: resize columns when column visibility changes by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19172
  • chore: SF logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19180
  • fix: placeholder-added-robin-host-select by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19184
  • chore: migrate orgDomain instant meeting route to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19067
  • chore: migrate user booking pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19069
  • feat: move apps to more by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19206
  • perf: fetch only by id by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19154
  • fix: typos in apps/web by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19194
  • fix: typo in conferencing.repository.ts filename (#19161) by @mohdaquib171 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19173
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19214
  • chore: changed "routing" icon by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19211
  • chore: removed props.hideHeadingOnMobile by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19208
  • chore: move getTeamMemberEmailFromCrm to package/lib by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19174
  • fix: update hungarian translation for booking and cancellation texts by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19218
  • fix: Disable round robin reassignment if reroute is available by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19192
  • feat: remove tabs when only user and no team by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19222

New Contributors

  • @mohdaquib171 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.8...v4.9.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: RSC boundary error from auth/oauth2/authorize by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19226
  • fix: replace filter implementations on /insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19033
  • fix: the set as default apps issue with links #19176 by @PAVANNAIK25 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19198
  • chore: atoms and docs update by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19137
  • fix: the word on confirm booking button in japanese by @anushka-0099 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19230
  • feat: v2 GET bookings updated at filters and sort by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19133
  • fix: broken preview embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19223
  • chore: added impersonation to sidebar for admins by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19228
  • fix: get user loggedin if accouont is found + add better error handling for new user creation by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19229
  • fix: bookings for guests added by organizer get cancelled when rescheduled by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17820
  • fix: select "Your account" for members by default on insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19236
  • chore: Update CODEOWNERS to include more booking files by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19240
  • revert: "fix: bookings for guests added by organizer get cancelled wh… by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19243
  • perf: Use a limit for searching website in Salesforce by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19244
  • fix: Multiple rr-hosts combine to create erroneous availability by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18772

New Contributors

  • @PAVANNAIK25 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19198
  • @anushka-0099 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.9...v4.9.10

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: decode params used in query object in buildLegacyCtx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19253
  • fix: Salesforce bugs by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19250
  • fix: small ui bug in 404 pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19254
  • fix: CTA is hidden on mobile by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19241
  • fix: v2 slots not returning attendees and bookingUid info by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18858
  • chore: Remove BookerSeo component by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19190
  • perf: remove WithLayout HOC from private booking page and booking embed by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19189
  • chore: remove unneeded props from AuthContainer and make its usages cleaner by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19191
  • fix: overlapping-dropdown-bookings-page by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19216
  • chore: salesforce for Router / Booker atoms and api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19217
  • fix: indicate hidden columns on filter dropdown by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19259
  • fix: path to impersonation page on side bar by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19260
  • fix: added youtube videos to tips.tsx sidebar by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19245
  • feat: add country code by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19264
  • perf: Move PlainChat up the hierarchy to remove rerenders by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19255
  • fix: insights org without team return by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19266

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.10...v4.9.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: CreateCRMEvent task - Handle cancelled status by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19272
  • feat: Use new /routing URL for routing forms by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19235
  • fix: remove section on /bookings if no data exists by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19261
  • feat: v2 slots new version by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18758
  • refactor: remove depreceated fields by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19279
  • chore: Refactor to remove getServerSideProps for /teams route by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19286

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.11...v4.9.12
